title: Woman’s mystery illness turns out to be 3-inch snake parasite in her brain
description: It's the first time the snake parasite has been seen in a human, let alone a brain.

title: CenturyLink left 86-year-old woman with no Internet service for a month
description: After three canceled appointments, service restored one day after Ars emailed ISP.

title: Pew, pew, pew! These plants shoot out their seeds like bullets

description: New "swap and mop" feature changes cleaning mode depending on the tank.

description: We compare five streaming services to see which one offers the most for sportsball fans.
